about_the_game:
Zombie In Town is an action packed tower defense game in which you play as a boy who tries to defend his town from zombies invasion.

FEATURES


- Kill zombies with 12 weapons of choice
- 5 levels of map to play
- Buy weapon and upgrade weapon clip size
- Buy thousands of bullet. Yeah you will need that much
- 7 types of skill including Bomb, Dash and Turret
- Placeable turret and Barrel Bomb as strategy
- High replayable value
- 3 modes of gameplay

GAMEPLAY

Zombie In Town Mode


Survive Till Last Wave. Zombie Is Coming From Everywhere

"They are here. Zombie have reach this town. The town will be swamped with zombies by evening. You cannot let this happen. This is the only town left for human to get shelter

Save The Town"

Last Hope Mode


Save The Girl To Save The World. Crazy Amount of Zombies

"You are the last hope of humanity. Human are facing total extinction. You must save the last girl to breed again. This is the only chance to save humanity

Brace Yourself"

Search And Destroy Mode


Destroy All Zombies Nests To Save The Town

"Horde of zombies attack again. They must coming from some places. You must find the nests and destroy them. Choose your arsenals

May The Force be With You"

name: Zombie In Town

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz or Better
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
